member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT
member.summary: Indicates the level of support for protected resource sessions.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT.NodeIndex
member.summary: An input field, indicating the adapter index to query.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT.SharingTier
member.summary: An output field indicating the type of protected resource session support.
